duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect, assess, and manage property claims from start to finish, ensuring swift resolution and customer support.
Utilize negotiation and customer service skills to interact with customers, insurance carriers, and others.
Use field adjusting experience to handle claims involving partial fire, total fire, water damage, wind damage, flood damage, hail, and vandalism.
Determine the extent of property loss, estimate repair costs, and identify additional exposures related to a property loss.
Manage coverage and damage analysis of property claims, ensuring accurate assessment and compensation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher and a minimum of three years of related work experience, at least one year of which must include commercial, property, or specialty lines claims handling. Alternatively, an associate degree and a minimum of five years related work experience, or eight years of related work experience without a degree.
